answers.answer: My close friend had high blood pressure and preeclampsia! Her son is completely fine and she is to... she stopped working even earlier then 29 weeks.
With my first at 30 weeks i was told to do the same. No worries i did end up with preeclampsia at 36 weeks in was induced but my baby boy was perfect.
Thank you both, puts my mind at ease a little to know things can go ok. Blood pressure has been really good the past few days so I hope this continues.
Friend had this and had to take leave early she now has 3 heaLthy kids.

question: Hi everyone,I am 34 weeks and 5 days and just had my doctor's​ appointment. She has ordered me to stop working because she is worried about preclamcia. I have been feeling a little overwhelmed by this news because my husband and I have been trying for our little miracle for 10 years.  Has anyone gone through this? Just need to know I'm not alone and maybe hear some stories of things turning out ok.
title: Told to stop working early due to high blood pressure.
